title: Accessibility Checker
creator: Intent Based
description: A free web-based audit tool that scans your website for current WCAG standards. Its uniqueness is the presentation of the errors it finds on your website. For every error the scanner finds, you will receive a detailed explanation about it, whom it affects and multiple options on how to solve it.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
